item.title: Travis - Closer
item.description:
I’ve had enough
of this parade
I’m thinking of
the words to say
We open up
unfinished parts
Broken up
it’s only love
And when I see you
then I know
It will be
next to me
And when I need you
then I know
You will be
there with me
I’ll never
leave you
Just need to get
closer closer
Lean on me now
lean on me now
Closer closer
lean on me now
Lean on
me now
Keep waking up
without you here
Another day
another year
I seek the truth
we set apart
Second dance second
chance(second chance)
And when I see you
then I know
It will be
next to me
And when I need you
then I know

there with me

leave you

closer closer

lean on me now
